title: India says new EV policy will open up market to global players
summary: India's Department of Promotion of Industry and Internal Trade indicates new electric vehicle policy measures will help attract international manufacturers and investors to the country's growing EV market.
content:
India has expressed confidence that its newly announced electric vehicle policy initiatives will create opportunities for global automotive players to enter the market. The country's secretary of the Department of Promotion of Industry and Internal Trade emphasized the government's commitment to developing the EV sector.

The policy announcement, made last month, is part of India's broader push toward sustainable transportation and reducing dependency on fossil fuels. The measures aim to streamline regulations and provide incentives for international manufacturers looking to establish operations in India.

## Policy Overview

India has expressed confidence that its newly announced electric vehicle policy initiatives will create opportunities for global automotive players to enter the market. The country's secretary of the Department of Promotion of Industry and Internal Trade emphasized the government's commitment to developing the EV sector.

## Implementation Details

The policy announcement, made last month, is part of India's broader push toward sustainable transportation and reducing dependency on fossil fuels. The measures aim to streamline regulations and provide incentives for international manufacturers looking to establish operations in India.
